scripts.build: pnpm run build:mud && pnpm run build:abi && pnpm run build:abi-ts
scripts.build:mud: rm -rf src/codegen && mud tablegen && mud worldgen
scripts.clean: rm -rf src/codegen && rm -rf out && rm -rf cache
scripts.lint: pnpm run prettier && pnpm run solhint
scripts.access-config:inventory:local: source ./.env && PRIVATE_KEY=$PRIVATE_KEY && RPC_URL=$RPC_URL && CHAIN_ID=$CHAIN_ID && WORLD_ADDRESS=$WORLD_ADDRESS && BASE_URI=$BASE_URI && ADMIN_ACCOUNTS=$ADMIN_ACCOUNTS && forge script script/InventoryAccess.s.sol:InventoryAccess --private-key $PRIVATE_KEY --chain-id $CHAIN_ID --broadcast --rpc-url $RPC_URL  --sig "run(address)" $WORLD_ADDRESS -vvv
scripts.access-config:inventory:devent: source ./.env.devnet && PRIVATE_KEY=$PRIVATE_KEY && RPC_URL=$RPC_URL && CHAIN_ID=$CHAIN_ID && WORLD_ADDRESS=$WORLD_ADDRESS && BASE_URI=$BASE_URI && ADMIN_ACCOUNTS=$ADMIN_ACCOUNTS && forge script script/InventoryAccess.s.sol:InventoryAccess --private-key $PRIVATE_KEY --chain-id $CHAIN_ID --broadcast --rpc-url $RPC_URL  --sig "run(address)" $WORLD_ADDRESS -vvv
scripts.access-config:inventory:testnet: source ./.env.testnet && PRIVATE_KEY=$PRIVATE_KEY && RPC_URL=$RPC_URL && CHAIN_ID=$CHAIN_ID && WORLD_ADDRESS=$WORLD_ADDRESS && BASE_URI=$BASE_URI && ADMIN_ACCOUNTS=$ADMIN_ACCOUNTS && forge script script/InventoryAccess.s.sol:InventoryAccess --private-key $PRIVATE_KEY --chain-id $CHAIN_ID --broadcast --rpc-url $RPC_URL  --sig "run(address)" $WORLD_ADDRESS -vvv
